thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding in every way
thread.title_full: Outstanding in every way - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: brently55
title: Outstanding in every way
text: The room was fantastic, as was the service. Very accommodating, which is why we love FS. Had a very early departure and staff prepared a breakfast to-go, given we were departing before the restaurant opened. Room was huge, calming and beautifully furnished. Loved the in room Nespresso. Would definitely stay here again.
